"I guess I'll go to the gym." Ty said. He grabbed his gym bag and headed down to the gym.

About ten minutes later, he arrived at the gym. It was pretty busy in the gym that day. He looked around at all the machines people were using. He eventually decided to check out what girls were around in the gym, to dictate where he went to workout.

Ty looked over to the squat machine to see a girl, Marissa squatting 225. Her short-shorts did little to hide her massive ass, which flexed full of blood after her first set.

In his nap, he dreamed of being in a big puffy room filled with big pillows everywhere. He started off in the clothes that he fell asleep in, but the longer he looked around, the more the room seemed to swell in size. Ty looked down at his clothes to find that they had disappeared!

"What the hell!" Ty shouted, finding his bottom to be the only thing covered, by a big puffy diaper no less.

info.brief_description: This is an interactive about the life of a young man named Ty who becomes tinier
info.description:
You are Ty, an 18 year old growing up in the suburbs of Springfield, wherever.

Through various means, you find yourself shrunk at the hands of various women and girls you know, and find them growing larger, more voluptuous and far more powerful than you.
These women become either your goddess, tormentor or savior, sometimes all three. Each story has different motives and each girl wants to do different things. Maybe you'll accidentally cause them to become an ever-growing goddess, or maybe they'll gradually turn you into a little baby who shrinks to the size of a grain of sand! The possibility is endless!

Keep it straight please,
Keep the main character Ty,
Ty can never become larger than the girl who shrinks him.



When I first made this interactive, I was hopeful that I would find an interactive that would have everything I was looking for in it. I am passionate about making this the ultimate interactive for my tastes, if you'd like to contribute, please do, but keep the spirit of my story alive, and try to add decent sized entries if they aren't setting up for some greater purpose for you.

I WILL TIP 500GP for good entries (Starting June 2018! Please let me know if you didn't receive yours!)
info.pretty_title: Women grow big, you shrink and regress.
